name: apim-s3-cache-action
description: ## Overview The S3 cache action should be used with build pipelines in Azure DevOps to give us better control of our caching when deploying APIs. This is currently at a proof of concept stage.

scripts.localstack:init: npm run localstack:up && docker logs localstack -f
scripts.localstack:config: aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 s3 mb s3://demo-bucket && aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 s3api put-bucket-acl --bucket demo-bucket --acl public-read
